title: White Screen
body: I just got a new computer and have installed, deleted and reinstalled league a few times now.  Every time I attempt to load into a game after champion select, I just see a white screen and it says I am not connected to the internet.  My internet connection is fine though.  Anybody know any possible solutions?  When I click retry it changes nothing and when I click cancel and reconnect again, still the same problem persists.  Any help would be great thanks!

replies.body: That frozen white screen is a pretty decent sign that the game wasn't able to get a solid connection with our servers and actually crashed from not responding soon enough. Let's do some basic network troubleshooting to cover the basics really quickly using our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but let me know if that doesn't seem to fix things.
